application

Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Snake
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Snake
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean alive 
      private int effect 
      private Point head 
      private java.util.LinkedList<javafx.scene.shape.Circle> images 
      private int length 
      private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> origin 
      private java.util.LinkedList<Point> points 
      private int radius 
      private javafx.scene.text.Text text 
      private int x_velocity 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Snake(Point _head, int _length)
      constructor of snake object, intializes the head of the snake and the length and generates the rest of the body as per its length text and images are also initialized here and color is assigned to image and text

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void extend()
      increases the length of the snake by 1
      java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getBoundary_for_wall()
      returns the boundary of the corresponding whole body of the snake
      java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getBoundary()
      returns the boundary of the corresponding head of the snake
      Point getHead()
      returns the location of head of the snake
      java.util.LinkedList<javafx.scene.shape.Circle> getImage()
      returns the list of images of each body of the snakes from its head to tail
      int getLength()
      returns the length of the snake
      java.util.LinkedList<Point> getPoints()
      returns the list of location of each body of the snake
      int getRadius()
      returns radius of the each body(circle) snake
      javafx.scene.text.Text getText()
      returns the snake's length which will be displayed on the screen as a text over each snake
      int getX_velocity()
      returns x_velocity of snake(speed at which snakes moves)
      void increase_length(int n)
      increases the length of the snake by n
      boolean intersects(Token s)
      check if the snake intersercts with any other object on the screen
      boolean is_in_zone(Food food)
      checks if the food is with a required distance from snake's head
      boolean isalive()
      checks if the snake's length is greater than zero or not
      void move_left()
      moves the entire snake to the left as per its x-velocity
      void move_right()
      moves the entire snake to the right as per its x-velocity
      void reduce()
      reduces the length of the snake by 1 throws an exception when snake's length is less than or equal to zero
      void setHead(Point head)
      sets the location of head of the snake
      void setLength(int length)
      sets the length of the snake
      void setPoints(java.util.LinkedList<Point> points)
      sets the location of each body of the snake

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
